meta.name: Magdalen College
meta.info: A tour around Magdalen College, Oxford, guiding you through the main college premises, with the freedom to stop at important locations and explore further.

poi.name: Grove Buildings
poi.info: Grove Quad (newest buildings in College) and the famed Deer Park

poi.name: Grove Path
poi.info: Path between Grove A and D

poi.name: Grove/Audi Path
poi.info: Path leading from Grove and the Auditorium to College

poi.name: New Buildings Lawns
poi.info: CS Lewis lived in one of the rooms overlooking the lawns (look for a window with red flowers).

poi.name: Path to OKB
poi.info: Path to the oldest structure in College, goes near Addison's Walk.

poi.name: Chapel Cloisters Entrance
poi.info: Entrance to Cloisters near Magdalen Chapel, which is led by the Dean of Divinity.

poi.name: St John's Quad
poi.info: Entrance quad of Magdalen, formerly the site of St. John's Hospital.

poi.name: St Swithun's Arch
poi.info: St. Swithun's Tower contains rooms and a turret computer lab.

poi.name: St Swithun's Quad Lawn
poi.info: Magdalen's temporary library is here, while the New Library is redeveloped.

poi.name: Auditorium Gates
poi.info: Magdalen Auditorium frequently hosts events open to University members or the public.
